headline: Pedro Cherry Named President of Mississippi Power; Anthony Wilson To Remain Chairman and CEO Until Summer
summary: GULPORT, MS / ACCESS Newswire / March 21, 2025 /Southern Company: Mississippi Power announced that Pedro Cherry has been named president of the company with Anthony Wilson continuing in his roles of chairman and CEO until summer. Cherry has worked ...
